title: ESS基础插件汉化问题
author: 挽青离风
txt_content: 版本1.12.2 神奇宝贝服务器 = =不知道怎么汉化啊 求教程

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
汉化是指什么汉化  指令汉化还是配置文件汉化？ 指令的话ESS是自带汉化的配置文件汉化

replies.txt_content:

Pixelmon-1.12.2-7.0.6-universal.jar\assets\pixelmon\lang
把里面的文件删光，只留下zh_cn

replies.author: skyliye

插件已自带汉化，在config.yml中设置即可
language选择zhcn

replies.author: 挽青离风
replies.txt_content:
skyliye 发表于 2019-6-17 21:46
插件已自带汉化，在config.yml中设置即可
language选择zhcn
# Set the locale for all messages.
# If you don't set this, the default locale of the server will be used.
# For example, to set language to English, set locale to en, to use the file "messages_en.properties".
# Don't forget to remove the # in front of the line.
# For more information, visit http://wiki.ess3.net/wiki/Locale


改哪里

replies.txt_content:
qq2908521881 发表于 2019-6-18 21:15
# Set the locale for all messages.
# If you don't set this, the default locale of the server will  ...
改这里，
locale: zh
